short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: InstaApply makes your job search a breeze. Apply to 100s of jobs quickly, effortlessly, and unlock your career potential.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Version 1.3+ has launched ! (Nov 2024)

Applying to jobs is sometimes a number game and InstaApply is the ultimate application tool for applying to several jobs in one go. 

🔥 TRY BEFORE YOU BUY ~ FREE TRIAL 
You can now take the extension for a spin to see just how effective it is!

FEATURE LIST 
✦ Auto Form Filling ~ Lightning Fast (for several supported websites) 
✦ 💫  (All new) Interview Practice: Prepare for your next interview with tailored interviews based on any job description
✦ 💫  (All-new) 'Answer Writer'. An advanced AI that can answer almost any job application question with knowledge of your work history.
✦ Cover Letter Generation Powered by Our AI (Use on any website!)
✦ Generate custom resumes for each job application (Use on any website!)
✦ Use our Harvard-Resume editor to customize or create resumes
✦ Get ATS-Resume Score for your resume 
✦ With our answer revision tool, you can modify your answers and set the tone, shorten, expand, improve, make more/less formal and much more!  

👆 The best part is all of this can be done from just one tab!

⭐️ Coming Soon (in Nov. 2024)
Auto Apply: Using our advanced form-filing AI, we will auto apply to 400+ jobs for you every month! Every application will have quality answers and cover letters completely based on your work experience!

     • 2x resume analysis / day
     • Auto Resume uploads
     • AI Cover Letters
     • 1x active devices
2. 🤯 InstaApply Lifetime Plan
     • 8x resume analysis / day
     • 3x active devices
     • Lifetime Updates
     • Resume Website (coming soon)

🥳 🎉 Happy job searching!
